citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 am on 19-
OCT-2022. The inspector knocked on all doors and honked the horn. A neighbor approached and stated the family was
out of town all day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 am on 19-
OCT-2022.  The inspector knocked on all doors and honked the horn.  A neighbor approached and stated the family was 
out of town all day. 
 
 
 
End Section
